page.title: 02Bramley 1985 _ environment.
page.content: { The area is one of the highest in {this region}with Beacon Hill, in the south east of our area rising to 145M. Wickersley cross roads has a spot height of 138M.The road drops quite quickly from these areas in all directions. { The area is basically split into a {60_40 ratio of farmland to {residential,}with more being built in the present and near future. There is very little in the area in respect of playing fields and parks and this causes pressure on the area. There are several old age peoples homes and sheltered accomodation in the Bramley and Flanderwell area. Wickersley has previously won the village competition showing that{the {local population has a pride in their {area.
